verbs.description: I [V: ’ve] had postings from my friend George in Louisiana and my friend Marsha in Toronto , telling me that the “ Pittsburgh Post - Gaztette ” fired Rob Rogers , their longtime cartoonist . Rogers has been doing cartoons that are critical of Trump ’s policies , ...
